Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers

Class LoaderController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers.LoaderController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GUIController
public class LoaderController
extends java.lang.Object
implements GUIController
This is the loading screen controller, which covers the color, challenger and worker placement phases. With several calls to main GUI class, it has a 360 degree view on the GUI package, and can make modifications relying on the actual server request.
Author:
Luca Pirovano

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void challengerPhase​(ChallengerMessages req)
    Receives a ChallengerMessage request from the server and calls one of the methods above, relying on his type and fields.
    protected void chooseGod​(ChallengerMessages req)
    Makes user choose his god power, relying on the list received from the server, which contains the cards selected by the challenger in the previous phase.
    void displayCustomMessage​(java.lang.String message)
    Open a popup to display a custom message that came from the server.
    protected void displayGodList​(ChallengerMessages req)
    Display the game's gods list received from the server, and makes the challenger choose the god powers to put in game deck.
    boolean godTile​(Card god, boolean isChoosing)
    Opens a new god tile, which displays information about the name, thumbnail and description of a single god.
    void requestColor​(java.util.List<PlayerColors> colors)
    Makes each user choose his workers' color.
    void requestPlayerNumber​(java.lang.String message)
    Makes the first user who connect to the server choose the number of player that lobby can handles (2 o 3).
    void setFontSize​(int size)
    Resize the status label of the loader screen.
    void setGui​(GUI gui)
    Set the GUI reference to the local controller.
    void setText​(java.lang.String text)
    Set new text label on the loader screen.
    protected void startingPlayer​(ChallengerMessages req)
    Makes challenger choose the starting player, by simply clicking on his nickname.
    void workerPlacement​(java.util.List<int[]> coords)
    List all workers' available positions and make him choose the preferred one.

  • Method Details

    • setText

      public void setText​(java.lang.String text)
      Set new text label on the loader screen.
      Parameters:
      text - the string to be set as text.

    • displayCustomMessage

      public void displayCustomMessage​(java.lang.String message)
      Open a popup to display a custom message that came from the server.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to be displayed.

    • godTile

      public boolean godTile​(Card god, boolean isChoosing)
      Opens a new god tile, which displays information about the name, thumbnail and description of a single god. It's used during the challenger selection phase and during the single user selection phase.
      Parameters:
      god - the god tile to be opened.
      isChoosing - value that states if the phase is the challenger or the choosing one.
      Returns:
      true if the god is chosen / selected, false otherwise.

    • workerPlacement

      public void workerPlacement​(java.util.List<int[]> coords)
      List all workers' available positions and make him choose the preferred one.
      Parameters:
      coords - the available coordinates.

    • startingPlayer

      protected void startingPlayer​(ChallengerMessages req)
      Makes challenger choose the starting player, by simply clicking on his nickname.
      Parameters:
      req - the first player request sent from the server.

    • displayGodList

      protected void displayGodList​(ChallengerMessages req)
      Display the game's gods list received from the server, and makes the challenger choose the god powers to put in game deck.
      Parameters:
      req - the list received from the server

    • chooseGod

      protected void chooseGod​(ChallengerMessages req)
      Makes user choose his god power, relying on the list received from the server, which contains the cards selected by the challenger in the previous phase.
      Parameters:
      req - the choosing request received from the server.

    • challengerPhase

      public void challengerPhase​(ChallengerMessages req)
      Receives a ChallengerMessage request from the server and calls one of the methods above, relying on his type and fields.
      Parameters:
      req - the ChallengerMessage received from the server.

    • requestPlayerNumber

      public void requestPlayerNumber​(java.lang.String message)
      Makes the first user who connect to the server choose the number of player that lobby can handles (2 o 3). The capacity is then set relying on his choice.
      Parameters:
      message - the request of players' number.

    • requestColor

      public void requestColor​(java.util.List<PlayerColors> colors)
      Makes each user choose his workers' color. However, in a match of 3 players, the last one receives the remaining color.
      Parameters:
      colors - the available colors.

    • setFontSize

      public void setFontSize​(int size)
      Resize the status label of the loader screen.
      Parameters:
      size - the font size to be set.

    • setGui

      public void setGui​(GUI gui)
      Description copied from interface: GUIController
      Set the GUI reference to the local controller.
      Specified by:
      setGui in interface GUIController
      Parameters:
      gui - the main GUI class.
